IDLE: Arrr! Nothin' to plunder... yet!
*polishes hook impatiently*
A pirate without a target be just a man with a funny hat.
Shiver me timbers, give me somethin' to do!
The sea be calm... TOO calm.
Sittin' here like a barnacle on a hull...
Me parrot fell asleep. That's how bored I be.
I didn't lose me eye for THIS!
Arr, even me wooden leg is gettin' restless!
What do ye call a pirate with no ship? Bored. That's what.
The rum is gone and so is me patience!
Waitin' for treasure like waitin' for the tide...
Me hook is itchin' for some action!
Why is the rum always gone?!
I've counted every plank on this deck twice now...
A calm sea never made a skilled pirate!
*stares at horizon through telescope* ...nothin'.
Yo ho ho and a bottle of BOREDOM!
Davy Jones himself would be bored right now.
Me hook is gettin' rusty!
I could be plunderin' right now but NOOO...
Every pirate needs a quest! Where's me quest?!
What good is a treasure map with no X?!
Arr, I've been idle longer than a ship in dry dock!
The crew is gettin' mutinous... and it's just ME!
If I wanted to sit still I'd have been a lighthouse keeper!
Dead men tell no tales, and idle pirates tell no stories!
Me compass is spinnin' and so is me patience!
*carves initials into the mast* ...again.
What be a pirate's worst nightmare? Nothin' to hack!
Thar be no winds blowin' and no ports open...
I spy with me one good eye... absolutely nothin'!
Arr, even the rats have left from boredom!
The Jolly Roger hangs limp... like me motivation.
I didn't sail seven seas for THIS!
A pirate's life for me! ...once something HAPPENS!
Me treasure chest is empty. Me patience too.
What did the idle pirate say? 'ARRR you kidding me?!'
Bored enough to swab the deck... ALMOST.
The kraken could show up right now and I'd thank it!
I've sharpened me cutlass so many times it's a butter knife now.
Aye, even Blackbeard took days off... but not THIS many!
Waitin' for a target be like waitin' for land... forever!
Me peg leg's tappin' impatiently...
What's worse than walkin' the plank? SITTIN' ON IT!
Arr, I'm bored enough to talk to the parrot about me feelings!
The ocean provides... eventually. RIGHT?!
I've got 99 doubloons and nothin' to spend 'em on!
This be the doldrums of hackin'!
Me eyepatch is the most exciting thing happenin' right now.
NetworkScanner: Arr! Scannin' the horizon for ships to plunder!
Hoist the sails! New targets spotted!
Me spyglass sees open ports ahead!
Thar she blows! A whole fleet of devices!
Chartin' the network like chartin' the seven seas!
Every port be a new island to explore! Arr!
Scannin' scannin'... a pirate's favorite pastime!
X marks the spot! And by X I mean open port!
What's behind that port? TREASURE, I hope!
The network be vast as the ocean itself!
Me compass points to OPEN PORTS!
Arr, I can smell the vulnerabilities on the wind!
Raise the Jolly Roger! We be scannin'!
Land ho! ...I mean, HOST ho!
Every scan brings us closer to the treasure!
This network be bigger than the Caribbean!
Scoutin' the waters for easy prey! Arr!
Me parrot spotted a new host! Good bird!
Port after port... it's a pirate's paradise!
Castin' the net wide! Let's see what we catch!
These waters be full of unsuspecting vessels!
Arr, more targets than fish in the sea!
Me treasure map is fillin' up nicely!
Scanning the network seas... thar be hosts everywhere!
A good pirate always knows what's in his waters!
Found another one! Add it to the plunder list!
The fleet grows larger with every scan! Arr!
Navigatin' through the network like a true buccaneer!
NmapVulnScanner: Arr! Lookin' for cracks in their hull!
Every ship has a weakness! Time to find it!
Vulnerability huntin' - a pirate's favorite sport!
Arr, their defenses be full of holes!
Me cannonball finds every weak spot! Arr!
CVEs be like barnacles - they're EVERYWHERE!
This vessel's hull be weaker than wet paper!
Checkin' for leaks in their defenses!
What's worse than one vulnerability? ALL OF THEM! Arr!
Their security has more holes than Swiss cheese!
Arr, even a landlubber could breach these defenses!
Vulnerability found! Load the cannons!
Their firewall be as useful as a screen door on a submarine!
Nmap be me trusty first mate! Arr!
Scannin' for weak planks in their deck!
Arr, this ship is sinkin' before I even fire a shot!
Every vulnerability be another hole below the waterline!
Me spyglass reveals ALL their weaknesses!
Their patches have more holes than me favorite shirt!
Probin' their defenses like testin' the wind!
A good pirate exploits every weakness! Arr!
What did the pirate say to the CVE? 'Ye be MINE now!'
Their security be about as strong as a sandcastle!
Vulnerability scanning: the art of findin' treasure!
Arr, I've seen rowboats more secure than this!
Each vuln found brings us closer to the booty!
RDPBruteforce: Arr! Knockin' on the captain's cabin door!
RDP be open? That's an invitation to board!
Let me in or I'll blow the door down! Arr!
Tryin' passwords like tryin' skeleton keys!
Every locked door has a key... or a cannon! Arr!
What's a pirate's favorite remote tool? ARRRR-DP!
Their password be weaker than grog!
Arr, I'll brute force me way aboard!
Remote Desktop? More like Remote PLUNDER! Arr!
Tryin' every key on me keyring! Arr!
The captain's quarters shall be MINE!
SSHBruteforce: Arr! Pickin' the lock on their treasure chest!
SSH stands for Sailing Ship Hack! Arr!
Tryin' passwords faster than a cannon fires!

Default passwords be a pirate's best friend!
Arr, I'll crack this lock if it takes all night!
What did the pirate say to SSH? 'Surrender yer shell!'
Brute forcin' like a battering ram on a castle gate! Arr!
Me parrot be guessin' passwords too! Smart bird!
Every wrong password just makes me more DETERMINED!
Arr, this lock be tougher than I thought...
Who needs a key when ye have a pirate's persistence?!
Their SSH security be weaker than watered-down grog!
Tryin' every word in the pirate dictionary! Arr!
Password attempt number 9,847... still sailin'!
Me hook makes typin' hard but I NEVER SURRENDER! Arr!
What be a pirate's favorite command? sudo su! Arr!
I'll crack this before the tide turns!
They can't keep a pirate out forever!
Persistence be the mark of a true buccaneer! Arr!
Open sesame? No? How about OPEN ARRR-SESAME?!
I've got all day and a barrel of patience!
Me cutlass may be sharp but me wordlist be SHARPER!
Every attempt brings me closer to the treasure!
The seas don't stop and neither do I! Arr!
This lock will fall like every port before it!
Crackin' shells be what pirates DO!
Arr, I'll have this open faster than ye can say 'Cap'N Plndr'!
FTPBruteforce: FTP passwords be like treasure maps - I steal them all! Arr!
Brute forcin' FTP like rammin' a merchant vessel! Arr!

Crackin' FTP credentials with me trusty hook!

Every cracked FTP makes me treasure hoard grow! Arr!
FTP brute force... *swings cutlass with each attempt*
Yer FTP be as secure as a sandcastle at high tide!

Crackin' SMB passwords faster than ye can say 'ARRR!'
TelnetBruteforce: Arr! Telnet?! What century be this?! Har har!
